show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: To Tip Or Not To Tip

title: To Tip Or Not To Tip
content:
A quick word on Obamacare and how it is not considered that the current, 45,000 lack-of-insurance-based fatalities will... <!--more--> decrease significantly – if at all – under Obamacare.
Obamacare is expected to continue to leave 31 million people uncovered.
A true monstrosity.
Tipping: the psychological irrelevance to servers, the absurd business model, the bad feeling it engenders and the illogic to the customer who almost certainly doesn’t receive tips in his/her line of work.
There is also extreme sexism involved.
Interesting experiments leading to some surprising conclusions.
Quick comment on the debt ceiling.
Quick comment on the stock market from John Hussman.
Why the Fed’s low interest-rate policy is so criminal.
How the economy changed from pre to post-World War II.
A dire warning from David Walker, former US Comptroller General has been ignored.
Consequences to follow.
